description:
The Conservative Party has reached millions of people with digital adverts that falsely claim Labour would impose new taxes on drivers.  In recent days the Tories have launched hundreds of new online adverts falsely claiming that Labour would introduce a nationwide ultra-low emission zone (ULEZ) that would charge people for using highly-polluting vehicles.  Labour’s London […]

The post Tories Spend Tens of Thousands on Ads Spreading Bogus Driving Tax Claims appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Tories Spend Tens of Thousands on Ads Spreading Bogus Driving Tax Claims
